Umineko Project (UP): Just then, they heard the sound of wild footsteps from upstairs. The guesthouse wasn't a cheap building, so if they had been any normal footsteps, there was no way they would have heard them.
Steam (ST): At that moment, they heard the sound of wild footsteps coming from the second floor. The guesthouse wasn't a cheap building, so they wouldn't normally have heard the sound of footsteps.

Russian (RU): Тут они услышали торопливые шаги со второго этажа. Домик для гостей никак не был дешёвым зданием, поэтому обычно звуки шагов было невозможно расслышать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Bem nesse momento, eles ouviram passos selvagens no andar de cima. A casa de hóspedes não era uma construção barata, então, se houvesse algum passo normal, não haveria jeito de ouvi‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 剛說完，二樓就傳來了“嗵嗵嗵”的激烈腳步聲。賓館並不是低檔建築物，一般的腳步聲是不可能傳入耳中的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 刚说完，二楼就传来了“嗵嗵嗵”的激烈脚步声。宾馆并不是低档建筑物，一般的脚步声是不可能传入耳中的。

Umineko Project (UP): It was like the sound of someone stamping their feet in frustration.
Steam (ST): It was like the sound of someone stamping their feet in frustration.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was like the sound of someone stamping their feet in frustration.
PC Japanese (JP): 踵で地団太を踏むような、そんな音だった。
Russian (RU): Этот звук походил на отчаянный топот ног.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era como o som de alguém batendo seus pés em frustração.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 这就像用脚后跟猛跺地板时发出的声音。

Umineko Project (UP): And not a moment later, in addition to the apparent sound of feet running out into the upstairs corridor, they could hear Maria calling "uu‐uu‐uu" over and over again, sounding displeased.
Steam (ST): And an instant later, accompanied by what seemed to be the sound of her running out into the second floor hallway, they could hear Maria calling uu-uu-uu- over and over again, sounding displeased.

Russian (RU): И сразу же, следом за звуком топота на втором этаже, они смогли расслышать недовольный и плачущий голос Марии, ноющей "у‐у‐у" и повторяющей своё уканье раз за разом.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 紧接着，马上就传来了一阵，貌似是跑到了二楼走廊上的脚步声，与真里亚反复叫着“呜——呜——呜——”的不高兴的声音。

Chinese Simplified (CN): “啪哒啪哒啪哒”的吵闹声下了二楼，冲进了大厅。

Steam (ST): It was Maria, who was sobbing, along with the other children and Nanjo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was Maria, who was sobbing, along with the other children and Nanjo.
PC Japanese (JP): 泣きじゃくる真里亞と、それに付いてきた子どもたち、そして南條だった。
Russian (RU): Это была рыдавшая Мария в сопровождении остальных детей и Нанджо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era Maria, que estava chorando; as outras crianças, que tinham descido com ela; e Nanjo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 進來的是抽泣著的真里亞，跟在她身後的孩子們，還有南條。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 进来的是抽泣着的真里亚，跟在她身后的孩子们，还有南条。

Steam (ST): ...In other words, they had all come downstairs because of Maria's tantrum.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...In other words, they had all come downstairs because of Maria's tantrum.
PC Japanese (JP): …つまり、真里亞の大騒ぎのせいで、２階の全員が降りてきてしまったというわけだ。
Russian (RU): ...Иными словами, все они спустились вниз из‐за случившейся у Марии истерики.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Em outras palavras, todos no segundo andar tinham descido as escadas por causa da birra de Maria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …也就是說，由於真里亞的大吵大鬧，待在二樓的人全下來了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …也就是说，由于真里亚的大吵大闹，待在二楼的人全下来了。

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa couldn't hide her dizziness at the scale of the annoyance her daughter was bringing to everyone...
Steam (ST): Rosa couldn't hide her dizziness at this new annoyance her daughter was bringing to everyone...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa couldn't hide her dizziness at this new annoyance her daughter was bringing to everyone...
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は自分の娘が掛けている迷惑の規模に、再び眩暈が起こるのを隠せずにいた…。
Russian (RU): Роза была не в силах скрыть своё головокружение, вызванное очередным раздражителем в лице её дочери, привлекающей всеобщее внимание...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa não conseguia esconder sua tontura na escala de aborrecimento que sua filha estava trazendo para todos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對自己女兒添亂的規模之大，樓座無法掩飾住再次襲上大腦的眩暈感…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对自己女儿添乱的规模之大，楼座无法掩饰住再次袭上大脑的眩晕感…。

Steam (ST): "S-Sorry, Aunt Rosa... We tried to calm her, but she just wouldn't listen..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "S, sorry, Rosa oba-san... We tried to calm her, but she just wouldn't listen..."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): The sudden rise in the tone of Rosa's voice surprised the children.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座が急に声のトーンを上げたので子どもたちは仰け反るくらいに驚く。
Russian (RU): Неожиданно резко повышенный тон голоса Розы удивил детей.

Steam (ST): But Maria's crying just grew louder, and her tantrum just grew fiercer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Maria's crying just grew louder, and her tantrum just grew fiercer.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas o choro de Maria ficou mais alto, e sua birra cada vez mais feroz.

Umineko Project (UP): "R‐...Rosa‐san. You mustn't scold a child so bluntly without attending to what they say... ...In times like this, it is good to give them some warm milk or something."
Steam (ST): "R-Rosa-san, you mustn't scold a child so unsparingly... ...At times like this, it's best to give them some warm milk or something."

Umineko Project (UP): Without hiding her displeasure, Rosa grabbed her handbag that she had placed on the sofa and fished around for the medicine. ......It seemed that she had brought some child‐use sedatives for Maria's tantrums.
Steam (ST): Without hiding her displeasure, Rosa grabbed the handbag that had been set on the sofa and fished around for some medicine. ...It seemed she had brought some child-use sedatives for Maria's tantrums.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Without hiding her displeasure, Rosa grabbed the handbag that had been set on the sofa and fished around for some medicine. ......It seemed that she had brought some child-use sedatives for Maria's tantrums.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は不機嫌を隠すことなく、ソファーに置いてあったハンドバッグを取り、中の常備薬を漁る。……真里亞の癇癪用に、小児用の鎮静剤を持ってきているようだった。
Russian (RU): Не скрывая своего дурного настроения, Роза раскрыла лежащий на диване саквояж и стала рыться в нём в поисках лекарства. ......Судя по всему, она принесла с собой успокоительное для снятия истерики у Марии.

Umineko Project (UP): She found it and tipped the bottle into her palm, but it seemed to be empty.{n}Irritated, Rosa shook the bottle several times, but that didn't change the fact that nothing was in there.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを見つけ瓶を傾けるが、どうも空っぽらしい。{n}楼座はイライラしながら瓶を何度も振るが、空である事実は変わらなかった。
Russian (RU): Она извлекла и открыла пузырёк, но, судя по всему, он оказался пустым.{n}Роза с раздражением несколько раз встряхнула пузырёк, но это не изменило того факта, что в нём ничего не было.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 找到後，樓座把藥瓶傾斜一倒，不過好像已經沒藥了。{n}樓座心急火燎地反覆搖著藥瓶，但瓶中空無一物已是無法改變的事實。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 找到后，楼座把药瓶倾斜一倒，不过好像已经没药了。{n}楼座心急火燎地反复摇着药瓶，但瓶中空无一物已是无法改变的事实。

Umineko Project (UP): ...All the while, Maria's crying was growing more and more intense...

Russian (RU): ...Похоже, это болью отдавалось в ушах Евы.{n}Или, быть может, она просто сдерживала головную боль.{n}Ева застонала, словно от боли, и сильнее вдавила голову в подушку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Isso provavelmente era muito perturbador de se ouvir.{n}Ou talvez estivesse prejudicando sua dor de cabeça.{n}Eva gemeu como se estivesse com dor e se enterrou no cobertor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這聽起來相當刺耳吧。{n}又或許，是在忍耐頭痛之苦也說不定。{n}繪羽痛苦地哼哼著，蒙上了棉被。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这听起来相当刺耳吧。{n}又或许，是在忍耐头痛之苦也说不定。{n}绘羽痛苦地哼哼着，蒙上了棉被。

Umineko Project (UP): It was easy to guess what was happening. Maria had probably had a tantrum for some reason, gone down to the lobby, and when Rosa had scolded her for it, they had started arguing.
Steam (ST): It was easy to guess what was happening. Maria had probably had a tantrum for some reason, gone down to the lobby, and started arguing with Rosa, who then scolded her daughter.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was easy to guess what was happening. Maria had probably had a tantrum for some reason, gone down to the lobby, and started arguing with Rosa as she scolded her daughter.
PC Japanese (JP): おおよその想像はつく。真里亞が何かの理由で癇癪を起こし、下のロビーに降りてきて、それを叱る楼座と口論になったのだろう。
Russian (RU): Было совсем несложно догадаться, что происходило. У Марии, судя по всему, по какой то причине началась истерика, она спустилась в вестибюль, и начала спорить с Розой, пока та пыталась урезонить её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era fácil adivinhar o que estava acontecendo. Maria provavelmente havia feito birra por algum motivo, desceu para o lobby, e quando Rosa a repreendeu por isso, elas começaram a discutir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大致想像到了個輪廓。多半是真里亞因某種緣由發起了脾氣，下樓去了大廳，在那裡與斥責她的樓座吵了起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大致想象到了个轮廓。多半是真里亚因某种缘由发起了脾气，下楼去了大厅，在那里与斥责她的楼座吵了起来。

Umineko Project (UP): ...And then, the looks of the rest of the family had been too much to bear, so Rosa had taken Maria out into the corridor.
Steam (ST): ...And then, maybe that got too embarrassing to be shown in front of the other relatives, so Rosa had taken Maria out into the corridor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And then, perhaps, that was too pitiful to be shown in front of the other relatives, so Rosa had taken Maria out into the corridor.
PC Japanese (JP): …そして他の親族たちの目が痛々しかったので、廊下へ真里亞を連れ出した、というところなのか。
Russian (RU): ...И затем, возможно, чтобы не выглядеть жалко перед другими родственниками, Роза решила выйти с Марией в коридор.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E então, os olhares do resto da família tinham sido demais para Rosa suportar, por isso ela levou Maria para o corredor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …然後，樓座礙於其他親戚刺人的目光，而把真里亞帶到了走廊上吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …然后，楼座碍于其他亲戚刺人的目光，而把真里亚带到了走廊上吧。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Hideyoshi had no desire to interfere with Rosa and Maria's problems. ...But just for now, since Eva's condition was so bad, he wanted them to take their ruckus somewhere else.
Steam (ST): ...Hideyoshi had no desire to butt in on Rosa and Maria's problem. ...But just for now, since Eva's condition was so bad, he wanted them to take their ruckus somewhere else.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Hideyoshi had no desire to interfere with Rosa and Maria's problem....But just for now, since Eva's condition was so bad, he wanted them to take their ruckus somewhere else.
PC Japanese (JP): ……楼座と真里亞の問題に干渉する気は、秀吉にはまったくない。…でも、絵羽が体調を悪くしている今だけは、その騒ぎは他所でやってほしいと思った。
Russian (RU): ......У Хидэёши не было никакого желания встревать в проблемы Марии и Розы. ...Но лишь сейчас, когда у Евы было настолько плохое состояние, ему очень хотелось, чтобы этот шум перешёл в другое место.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Hideyoshi não tinha o desejo de interferir nos problemas de Rosa e Maria. ...Mas, apenas neste momento, já que a condição de Eva era tão ruim, ele queria que elas armassem esse tumulto em outro lugar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……秀吉完全沒有要去干涉樓座與真里亞的母女問題的意思。…不過，在繪羽身體不舒服的此刻，他還是希望她們去別的地方鬧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……秀吉完全没有要去干涉楼座与真里亚的母女问题的意思。…不过，在绘羽身体不舒服的此刻，他还是希望她们去别的地方闹。

Steam (ST): "...Wait just a sec. I'll ask them to keep it down."

Steam (ST): Rosa slapped Maria's cheek, lifted her up while covering her mouth, and dragged her towards the entrance, trying to at least put some distance between her and Hideyoshi's room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa slapped Maria's cheek, lifted her up while covering her mouth, and dragged her towards the entrance, trying to at least put some distance between her and Hideyoshi's room.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座はその頬をぴしゃりと叩いた後、真里亞の口を塞ぎながら抱え上げ、せめて秀吉たちの部屋から遠ざかるよう、玄関の方へ真里亞を連れて行った。
Russian (RU): Роза дала Марии пощёчину, приподняла её, прикрыла ей рот и потащила к выходу, пытаясь по крайней мере увеличить расстояние между ней и комнатой Хидэёши.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa deu um tapa no rosto de Maria, levantando‐a enquanto cobria sua boca, e a levou para a entrada, tentando, ao menos, colocar alguma distância entre ela e o quarto de Hideyoshi.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座“啪”地扇了真里亚一巴掌后，堵着她的嘴巴，将之抱起，为了至少先远离秀吉他们的房间，楼座抱着真里亚往大门走去。

Umineko Project (UP): ...They would still probably be clamorous for a while yet, but he had at least warned her.{n}Hoping that Rosa would show her capabilities as a mother, Hideyoshi closed the door.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …まだしばらくは賑やかだろうが、一応の釘は刺した。{n}秀吉は楼座の母親ぶりに期待しつつ扉を閉める。
Russian (RU): ...Она наверняка будет ещё шуметь некоторое время, но по крайней мере он успел дать Розе намёк.{n}Исходя из действий Розы как матери, Хидэёши запер дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Elas provavelmente ainda fariam algum tumulto por um tempo, mas pelo menos ele tinha advertido‐a.{n}Esperando que Rosa mostrasse suas habilidades como mãe, Hideyoshi fechou a porta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖然還會吵鬧一會兒，但已經提醒過她了。{n}秀吉邊期待著樓座能發揮母親的作用，邊關上了門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽然还会吵闹一会儿，但已经提醒过她了。{n}秀吉边期待着楼座能发挥母亲的作用，边关上了门。

PC Japanese (JP): 玄関では、真里亞の口を押さえたまま、楼座は途方に暮れていた。
Russian (RU): Остановившись у входа, по‐прежнему прикрывая рот Марии, Роза всё никак не могла определить, что делать дальше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na entrada, com a mão ainda tapando a boca de Maria, Rosa não sabia o que fazer em seguida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在門口，樓座捂著真里亞的嘴，不知如何是好。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在门口，楼座捂着真里亚的嘴，不知如何是好。

Umineko Project (UP): She had been unable to withstand everyone's gaze in the lobby, and had yelled at the children to go upstairs, before dashing out of the lobby.
Steam (ST): She hadn't been able to withstand everyone's gazes in the lobby, and had yelled at the children to go upstairs, dashing out of the lobby.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She hadn't been able to withstand everyone's gazes in the lobby, and had yelled at the children to go upstairs, dashing out of the lobby.
PC Japanese (JP): ロビーでみんなの視線に耐え切れず、子どもたちには２階へ上がれと怒鳴りつけ、ロビーを飛び出してしまった。
Russian (RU): Она была не в силах выдержать взглядов окружающих в вестибюле, и крикнула детям подниматься наверх, выбежав из вестибюля.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela tinha sido incapaz de suportar o olhar de todos no lobby, e tinha gritado para as crianças subirem as escadas, antes de saírem do lobby.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在大廳受不了大家的視線，對小孩子們怒吼“回二樓去”，跑出了大廳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在大厅受不了大家的视线，对小孩子们怒吼“回二楼去”，跑出了大厅。

Umineko Project (UP): And when she went out into the corridor, Hideyoshi had told her that she was being too noisy.
Steam (ST): Then, she had gone out into the corridor, only to have Hideyoshi say that she was too noisy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then she had gone out into the corridor, only to have Hideyoshi say that she was too noisy.
PC Japanese (JP): そして廊下に出れば、秀吉たちにうるさいと言われてしまった。
Russian (RU): Потом она вышла в коридор, лишь затем, чтобы Хидэёши намекнул, что от неё много шума.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E quando ela saiu para o corredor, Hideyoshi tinha dito que ela estava sendo muito barulhenta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後在走廊，又被秀吉說“太吵了”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后在走廊，又被秀吉说“太吵了”。

Umineko Project (UP): Where should I go now? ......Where should I take this child who's having a tantrum?
Steam (ST): Where should I go now? ...Where should I take this child who's having a tantrum?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Where should I go now?......Where should I take this child who's having a tantrum?
PC Japanese (JP): 私はどこへ行けばいいというのか。……この癇癪持ちの娘を連れて、どこへ行けばいいというのか。
Russian (RU): Куда я теперь пойду? ......Куда я могу отвести этого истеричного ребёнка?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Onde devo ir agora? ......Onde devo levar esta criança que está tendo um ataque de descontrole?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我到底該去哪裡才好？……帶著這麼個愛無理取鬧的女兒，我該去哪裡才好啊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我到底该去哪里才好？……带着这么个爱无理取闹的女儿，我该去哪里才好啊？

Umineko Project (UP): She felt as though she was about to cry in frustration...
Steam (ST): She felt as though tears of frustration were about to come out...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She felt as though tears of frustration were about to come out...
PC Japanese (JP): 悔し涙が溢れそうになった…。
Russian (RU): Она чувствовала, как на глаза начинают наворачиваться слёзы от безысходности...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela sentiu como se estivesse prestes a chorar de frustração...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 心酸的眼淚都快滿溢出眼眶了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 心酸的眼泪都快满溢出眼眶了…。

Umineko Project (UP): As Maria kept struggling in an attempt to scream, Rosa put her mouth up to Maria's ear, and tried to persuade Maria in as calm a voice as she could manage.
Steam (ST): As Maria kept struggling in an attempt to scream, Rosa put her mouth up to Maria's ear... and tried to persuade Maria in a properly calm voice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Maria kept struggling in an attempt to scream, Rosa put her mouth up to Maria's ear, and tried to persuade Maria in a properly calm voice.
PC Japanese (JP): 未だ、叫ぼうともがき続ける真里亞の耳元に口を寄せ、楼座はなるべく落ち着いた声で諭すように言う。
Russian (RU): Пока Мария боролась, пытаясь закричать, Роза приблизила рот к уху Марии и тихим голосом попыталась переубедить её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto Maria continuava lutando em sua tentativa de gritar, Rosa encostou sua boca no ouvido de Maria e tentou persuadi‐la com uma voz tão calma quanto possível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座將嘴貼近還在掙扎著想喊出聲的真里亞耳邊，盡可能地以心平氣和的聲音向她說道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座将嘴贴近还在挣扎着想喊出声的真里亚耳边，尽可能地以心平气和的声音向她说道。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Maria, you really want to see the rose that much...?"
Steam (ST): "......Maria, do you really want to see the rose that much...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Maria, do you really want to see the rose that much...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………真里亞は、そんなにも薔薇が見たいのね…？」
Russian (RU): ".........Мария, ты действительно так сильно хочешь увидеть ту розу?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Maria, você realmente quer ver muito essa rosa...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………真里亞是那麼地想看玫瑰嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………真里亚是那么地想看玫瑰吗…？」

Umineko Project (UP): Maria nodded her head several times, moaning "uu‐uu".
Steam (ST): Maria nodded her head several times, moaning uu-uu-.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria nodded her head several times, moaning uu-uu-.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は、うーうー唸りながら、何度も首を縦に振る。
Russian (RU): Мария несколько раз кивнула головой, хныкнув "у‐у".
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria assentiu com a cabeça várias vezes, murmurando "uu‐uu".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞邊“嗚——嗚——”地念叨著，邊不停地點頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚边“呜——呜——”地念叨着，边不停地点头。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "...Why do you want to see the rose that much? I'll listen to you, so will you tell me quietly? I'll hit you if you scream."
Steam (ST): "...Why do you want to see it so much? I'll listen as your mother, so will you tell me quietly? I'll hit you if you scream."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Why do you want to see the rose that much? I'll listen as your mother, so will you tell me quietly? I'll hit you if you scream."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…どうしてそんなに薔薇が見たいの？　お母さんが聞いてあげるから、静かに話して？　叫んだら殴るわよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…どうしてそんなに薔薇が見たいの？　お母さんが聞いてあげるから、静かに話して？　叫んだら殴るわよ」
Russian (RU): "...Почему ты так сильно хочешь увидеть ту розу? Я выслушаю тебя как твоя мать, так что ты тихо расскажешь мне? Я ударю, если начнёшь истерику."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Por que você quer ver essa rosa tanto assim? Eu vou ouvi‐la, então você pode me dizer, com calma? Vai apanhar se gritar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…為什麼那麼想看玫瑰呢？媽媽聽你講，要靜靜地說哦？若敢叫，就揍你哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…为什么那么想看玫瑰呢？妈妈听你讲，要静静地说哦？若敢叫，就揍你哦。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "............My rose... {f:5:Beatrice} revived it. ......It might have broken again... ...I'm worried about that... Can't sleep until I make sure..."
Steam (ST): "......My rose... {f:5:Beatrice} revived it. ...It might have snapped off again... ...I'm worried about that... I can't sleep until I'm sure..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............Maria's rose... Beatrice revived it. ......It might have broken again......Maria's worried about that... Can't sleep until she makes sure..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………真里亞の薔薇…。ベアトリーチェに蘇らせてもらったの。……また折れちゃってるかも…。…真里亞はそれが心配…。確かめないと眠れない…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………真里亞の薔薇…。ベアトリーチェに蘇らせてもらったの。……また折れちゃってるかも…。…真里亞はそれが心配…。確かめないと眠れない…」
Russian (RU): "............Роза Марии... {f:5:Беатриче} воскресила её. ......Она может опять сломаться... Мария боится за неё... не засну, пока не увижу..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............A rosa da Maria... A {f:5:Beatrice} a reviveu. ......Ela pode ter quebrado de novo... ...A Maria está preocupada com ela... Não posso dormir até ter certeza..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………真里亞的玫瑰…。貝阿朵莉切幫忙復甦了。……說不定又折斷了…。…真里亞很擔心…。不去看看就睡不著…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………真里亚的玫瑰…。贝阿朵莉切帮忙复苏了。……说不定又折断了…。…真里亚很担心…。不去看看就睡不着…」

Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that she was still making a fuss about that marked rose from yesterday.
Steam (ST): Apparently, she was still upset about that marked rose from yesterday.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In any event, it seemed that she was still upset about that marked rose from yesterday.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやら、昨日、目印をつけた薔薇についてまだ騒いでるらしい。
Russian (RU): В любом случае, все эти капризы лишь из‐за помеченной вчера розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que ela ainda estava fazendo um tumulto sobre aquela rosa marcada de ontem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來還在為昨天那朵做了記號的玫瑰鬧心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来还在为昨天那朵做了记号的玫瑰闹心。

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa felt her headache throbbing again, but she was at least a little relieved that Maria had now stopped her screaming.
Steam (ST): Rosa felt her headache throbbing again, but she was at least a little relieved that Maria had now stopped her screaming.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa felt her headache throbbing again, but she was at least a little relieved that Maria had now stopped her screaming.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は再び頭痛が疼くのを感じたが、とりあえず真里亞が叫ぶのだけはやめてくれたので、一安心する。
Russian (RU): Роза почувствовала, как её пульсирующая головная боль снова даёт о себе знать, но по крайней мере ей немного полегчало на душе, теперь, когда Мария прекратила свои крики.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa sentiu sua dor de cabeça latejando novamente, mas agora ela estava um pouco mais aliviada por Maria ter parado de gritar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然樓座再次感覺頭疼了起來，但由於真里亞至少不再叫了，而姑且安下了心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然楼座再次感觉头疼了起来，但由于真里亚至少不再叫了，而姑且安下了心。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "Anyway, everyone is having a hard time right now. So don't bother Mama and everyone else. ......You can worry about that rose all you want tomorrow, when it stops raining. So just listen to me for now...!"
Steam (ST): "Anyway, everyone is having a hard time right now. So don't bother Mama and everyone else. ...You can worry about that rose all you want tomorrow, when it stops raining. So for now, listen to me...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Anyway, everyone is having a hard time right now. So don't bother Mama and everyone else. ......You can worry about that rose all you want tomorrow, when it stops raining. So for now, listen to me...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「とにかく、今はみんな大変なの。だからママたちに迷惑を掛けないで。……薔薇の話は、明日、雨が上がったら好きにしていいから。だから今は聞き分けなさい…！」
Russian (RU): "Как бы там ни было, всем сейчас приходится тяжело. Зачем было заставлять нервничать маму и остальных. ......Ты могла бы рассказать про розу и завтра, когда бы закончился дождь. Поэтому пока что слушайся меня!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Seja como for, todo mundo está tendo dificuldades agora. Por isso, não incomode a mamãe e o resto. ......Amanhã você pode se preocupar com a rosa o quanto quiser, depois que a chuva parar. Então me escute agora...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「總之，現在大家都被折騰得夠嗆。所以別給媽媽與長輩們添亂。……玫瑰的事，等明天雨停後，你想怎樣就怎樣。所以，現在先聽話…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「总之，现在大家都被折腾得够呛。所以别给妈妈与长辈们添乱。……玫瑰的事，等明天雨停后，你想怎样就怎样。所以，现在先听话…！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "No. ...No no no no. My {f:5:Beatrice}'s rose... ...Uuuu..., uu‐uu. WaaaaaaAAaaaahh!!"
Steam (ST): "No. ...No no no no. It's my {f:5:Beatrice}'s rose... ...uuuu, ...uu-uu-. Waaaaaaaaaaahh!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "No. ...No no no no. Maria's Beatrice's rose......uuuu..., uu-uu-. Waaaaaaaaaaahh!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「やだ。…やだやだやだやだ。真里亞のベアトリーチェの薔薇…。…ううぅ…、うーうー。うわあああぁあああああぁあッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Нет. ...Нет‐нет‐нет‐нет. Роза Марии от {f:5:Беатриче}... у‐у‐у... у‐у. Уа‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não. ...Não, não, não, não! A rosa da Maria e da {f:5:Beatrice}... ...Uuuu..., uu‐uu. UaaaaaaAAaaaahh!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不要。…不要不要不要不要。真里亞的貝阿朵莉切的玫瑰…。…嗚嗚嗚…，嗚——嗚——。嗚哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不要。…不要不要不要不要。真里亚的贝阿朵莉切的玫瑰…。…呜呜呜…，呜——呜——。呜哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa reflexively covered Maria's mouth. She had spoken a little too harshly, and had gotten her agitated again...
Steam (ST): Rosa reflexively covered Maria's mouth. She had spoken a little too harshly and gotten her agitated again...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は反射的にその口を塞ぐ。口調を少し厳しくし過ぎたので、また興奮してしまったのだ…。
Russian (RU): Роза инстинктивно закрыла Марии рот. Она высказалась слегка сурово и тем самым снова довела её...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa reflexivamente cobriu a boca de Maria. Ela tinha de forma um pouco ríspida, deixando‐a agitada de novo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座條件反射地捂住了她的嘴。由於語調稍稍過於嚴厲了一點，又令她鬧騰起來了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座条件反射地捂住了她的嘴。由于语调稍稍过于严厉了一点，又令她闹腾起来了…。

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa realized that it was partly her own fault and clicked her tongue in self‐hatred.
Steam (ST): Rosa realized that it was partly her own fault and clicked her tongue in self-hatred.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa realized that it was partly her own fault and clicked her tongue in self-hatred.
PC Japanese (JP): それが半ば自分のせいであることを自覚し、楼座は自己嫌悪の意味で舌打ちをする。
Russian (RU): Роза осознала, что отчасти это по её вине и цокнула языком, кляня себя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa percebeu que, em parte, também era sua culpa e estalou sua língua, com ódio de si mesma..
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自知一半是自己的錯的樓座自我厭惡地咂了咂嘴。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自知一半是自己的错的楼座自我厌恶地咂了咂嘴。

Umineko Project (UP): But Maria thought that was directed at her, and her crying grew even fiercer...
Steam (ST): But Maria thought that was directed at her, and her crying grew even fiercer...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Maria thought that was directed at her, and her crying grew even fiercer...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし真里亞はそれが自分に対してのものだと思い、ますますに泣き声を荒げた…。
Russian (RU): Но Мария думала, что виновной считают её, и её рыдания стали ещё отчаянней...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas Maria pensou que isso foi direcionado a ela, e seu choro ficou ainda mais feroz...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，真里亞卻以為這是在針對自己，更是嚎啕大哭了起來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，真里亚却以为这是在针对自己，更是嚎啕大哭了起来…。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "...I'm begging you, be quiet... What can I do to make you stop crying? What should I do to make you listen to what your Mama says?"
Steam (ST): "...Please, just be quiet... What can I do to make you stop crying? What should I do to make you listen to what your Mama says?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…お願いだから静かにして…。どうしたらあなたは泣き止むの？　どうしたらあなたはママの言うことを聞いてくれるの？」
Russian (RU): "...Я прошу тебя, успокойся... Что я могу сделать, чтобы ты перестала плакать? Что мне сделать, чтобы заставить тебя слушать, что говорит мама?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Eu imploro, fique quieta agora... O que eu posso fazer para que você pare chorar? O que devo fazer para que você ouça o que a mamãe está dizendo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…算媽媽求你了，安靜一點…。要怎麼做，你才肯不哭啊？要怎麼做，你才肯聽媽媽的話？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…算妈妈求你了，安静一点…。要怎么做，你才肯不哭啊？要怎么做，你才肯听妈妈的话？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Russian (RU): [=OG]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JPC]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Umineko Project (UP): Abruptly. Maria stopped crying unnaturally fast.{n}......Then she turned around, and muttered.
Steam (ST): Suddenly. Maria stopped crying so fast that it seemed unnatural. ...Then she turned around...and muttered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Suddenly. Maria stopped crying so fast that it seemed unnatural.......Then she turned around, and muttered.
PC Japanese (JP): ぴたりと。真里亞が不自然なくらいに泣き止んだ。……すると振り返り、ぽつりと言った。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ぴたりと。真里亞が不自然なくらいに泣き止んだ。{n}……すると振り返り、ぽつりと言った。
Russian (RU): Неожиданно. Мария так быстро прекратила плакать, что это казалось неестественным.{n}......Затем она повернулась и пробормотала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Abruptamente. Maria parou de chorar de forma rápida e repentina.{n}......Então, ela se virou e murmurou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戛然而止。真里亞極其不自然地停止了哭泣。{n}……然後轉過頭，嘟噥了一句。

Umineko Project (UP): "............If I can see my rose, I'll be quiet until tomorrow."
Steam (ST): "...... If I get to see my rose, I'll stay quiet until tomorrow."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............ If Maria can see her rose, Maria will be quiet until tomorrow."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Se eu puder ver a rosa da Maria, ficarei quieta até amanhã."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………看了真里亚的玫瑰，真里亚就会安安静静地等到明天。」

Umineko Project (UP): "Really?"
Steam (ST): "Really?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): "Yes. ...If we go to the rose garden and see my rose, I'll calm down."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yes. ...If we go to the rose garden and see Maria's rose, Maria will be obedient."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「請隨意為之。貝阿朵莉切夫人，您已具有了無論什麼都能照著想象化為現實的力量。稍微用一下就會習慣的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「请随意为之。贝阿朵莉切夫人，您已具有了无论什么都能照着想象化为现实的力量。稍微用一下就会习惯的。」

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "......You worthless former sister. You should consider it an honor to have been selected as my first sacrifice as a witch. On the second twilight, I'll tear apart the two who are close, with my own hands...!!"
Steam (ST): "...You worthless former sister. You should consider it an honor to have been selected as the first sacrifice I offer as a witch. On the second twilight, I'll tear the two who are close apart with my own hands...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......You worthless former sister. You should consider it an honor to have been selected as the first sacrifice I offer as a witch. At the second twilight, I'll tear the two who are close apart with my own hands...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……不甲斐なき元妹よ。私が魔女として初めて奉げる最初の生贄に選ばれたことを、光栄に思うがいい。第二の晩に、寄り添う二人を、私がこの手で引き裂く…！！」
Russian (RU): "......От тебя никакого толку, бывшая младшая сестра. Это большая честь для тебя, оказаться выбранной в качестве первой жертвы для ведьмы. На вторые сумерки я собственными руками разорву близкую пару!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sua antiga e inútil irmã. Você deveria considerar uma honra ter sido escolhida como meu primeiro sacrifício enquanto bruxa. No segundo crepúsculo, vou despedaçar os dois que são próximos com minhas próprias mãos...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……沒出息的，我原先的妹妹啊。為能被選為我作為魔女第一個獻上的最初的活祭，而感到光榮吧。第二晚的，緊靠的兩人，由我親手撕裂…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……没出息的，我原先的妹妹啊。为能被选为我作为魔女第一个献上的最初的活祭，而感到光荣吧。第二晚的，紧靠的两人，由我亲手撕裂…！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The first thing the new {f:5:Beatrice} wished, ......no, the first magic she tried to use, was to surpass the limitations given to humans.
Steam (ST): The first thing the new {f:5:Beatrice} wished for... no, the first magic she tried to use, was to surpass the limitations given to humans.

Russian (RU): ......Как вдруг земля сама собой ушла у них из‐под ног и начала постепенно отдаляться.{n}Теперь их ноги уже не соприкасались с землёй.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O chão recuou por conta própria, a alguma profundidade abaixo delas.{n}Nesse momento, seus pés já não estavam mais presos ao chão.

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa finally realized that the ground hadn't retreated into the distance below her, but that she and the witch had been sucked up into the rainy sky.

PC Japanese (JP): 見てご覧、眼下を！　私たちのお屋敷ってあんなにも小さいわ。あんな小さな場所で、私たちはどれほどの長い時を過ごしたのかしら。…その狭さとちっぽけさに、今こそ本当に呆れるわ。

Russian (RU): "Посмотри же под себя! Посмотри на наш крошечный особняк. Я удивляюсь, как много времени нам пришлось провести в таком крохотном месте. ...Сейчас я особенно поражена, каким же крошечным и тесным оно является."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dê uma olhada, abaixo de você! Veja como nossa mansão é pequena. Eu me pergunto quanto tempo passamos em um lugar tão pequeno. ...Agora estou especialmente chocada vendo o quanto ela é pequena e apertada."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「俯瞰身下吧！我們家的大屋變得那麼小了哦？我們在那麼小的彈丸之地裡，生活了多少時間啊。…那份狹隘渺小，現在一看，真是嚇死人啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「俯瞰身下吧！我们家的大屋变得那么小了哦？我们在那么小的弹丸之地里，生活了多少时间啊。…那份狭隘渺小，现在一看，真是吓死人啊。」

Let's fly around like we're dancing! The lightning will shine on us and bless us!! Ahhahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!!"

Let's fly around like we're dancing! The lightning will shine on us and bless us!! Ahhahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!!"
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ感じて。楽しんで。喜んで…！　私たちが憧れた、大空を自由にする力を！　さぁ踊ろうよ楼座！　雨の中を、風の中を！　私たちは踊るように飛び回ろう！稲光が私たちを照らして祝福してくれるわ！！あっははははははははははははははははははッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「だからこそ感じて。楽しんで。喜んで…！　私たちが憧れた、大空を自由にする力を！　さぁ踊ろうよ楼座！　雨の中を、風の中を！　私たちは踊るように飛び回ろう！　稲光が私たちを照らして祝福してくれるわ！！　あっははははははははははははははははははッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Так что чувствуй. Веселись. Радуйся!.. Вот та сила, о которой мы мечтали, сила передвигаться по небу по своей воле! Давай же, давай, танцуй, Роза! Сквозь дожди, сквозь ветер! Давай танцевать в полёте! Сами молнии озаряют и благословляют нас!!! Ахха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então, sinta. Aprecie. Alegra‐se...! O poder pelo qual ansiávamos, o poder de mover‐se pelo céu à vontade! Venha, vamos dançar, Rosa! Através da chuva, através do vento! Vamos voar como se estivéssemos dançando! Os raios vão brilhar sobre nós e nos abençoar!! Ahhaha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}hahaha!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「所以，來感受、享受、喜悅吧…！我們曾經憧憬的，在天空中自由飛翔的力量！來，跳起來吧，樓座！在雨中，在風中！讓我們舞蹈般地翱翔吧！閃電在照亮我們，祝福著我們！！啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「所以，来感受、享受、喜悦吧…！我们曾经憧憬的，在天空中自由飞翔的力量！来，跳起来吧，楼座！在雨中，在风中！让我们舞蹈般地翱翔吧！闪电在照亮我们，祝福着我们！！啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The witch and Rosa were like leaves fluttering around in a whirlwind.{n}As the rain pounded upon every part of their bodies, as the lightning occasionally shone upon them, they shook with the joy of being released from the ground.
Steam (ST): The witch and Rosa were like leaves fluttering around in a whirlwind. As the rain pounded upon every part of their bodies, as the lightning occasionally shone upon them, they shook with the joy of being released from the ground.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch and Rosa were like leaves fluttering around in a whirlwind. As the rain pounded upon every part of their bodies, as the lightning occasionally shone upon them, they shook with the joy of being released from the ground.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女と楼座は、まるで旋風の中を舞う木の葉のよう。雨粒の拍手を全身に受けながら、時に稲光に照らされ、大地から解放された喜びに打ち震える。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 魔女と楼座は、まるで旋風の中を舞う木の葉のよう。{n}雨粒の拍手を全身に受けながら、時に稲光に照らされ、大地から解放された喜びに打ち震える。
Russian (RU): Ведьма и Роза напоминали листья, что кружатся, подхваченные вихрем.{n}Когда капли дождя стучали по каждой части их тел, когда молния время от времени озаряла их, они дрожали от восторга, вызванного освобождением от земли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa e a bruxa eram como folhas flutuando em um redemoinho.{n}Enquanto a chuva batia em cada parte de seus corpos, os relâmpagos ocasionalmente brilhavam sobre elas, o que resultava na alegria de estar liberta do chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女與樓座宛如在旋風中飛舞的樹葉。{n}全身承受著雨滴的鼓掌，時而被閃電照耀，為從大地上獲得解放的狂喜而震顫不已。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女与楼座宛如在旋风中飞舞的树叶。{n}全身承受着雨滴的鼓掌，时而被闪电照耀，为从大地上获得解放的狂喜而震颤不已。

Umineko Project (UP): ...However, it was only that way for the witch.{n}Rosa was holding onto her head, voicelessly screaming over and over.
Steam (ST): ...However, it was only that way for the witch. Rosa was holding onto her head, voicelessly screaming over and over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...However, it was only that way for the witch. Rosa was holding onto her head, voicelessly screaming over and over.
PC Japanese (JP): …もっともそれは魔女だけの話。楼座は自らの頭を抱え込み、声無き叫びを上げ続けていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …もっともそれは魔女だけの話。{n}楼座は自らの頭を抱え込み、声無き叫びを上げ続けていた。
Russian (RU): ...Впрочем, так было лишь для самой ведьмы.{n}Роза держалась за голову, глухо крича снова и снова.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...No entanto, era assim apenas para a bruxa.{n}Rosa estava segurando a própria cabeça, gritando sem parar várias e várias vezes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過說到底，這只是單指魔女。{n}樓座雙手抱緊自己的頭，持續不斷地發出無聲的驚叫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过说到底，这只是单指魔女。{n}楼座双手抱紧自己的头，持续不断地发出无声的惊叫。

Umineko Project (UP): "......You're right, it's more fitting for {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s to crawl on the ground. Then why not go back there?"
Steam (ST): "...You're right, it's more fitting for Humans to crawl on the ground. Then why not go back there?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......You're right, it's more fitting for humans to crawl on the ground. Then why not go back there?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうね、ニンゲンは大地を這うのがお似合いね。なら地上にお帰りなさい？」
Russian (RU): "......Ты права, {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ям больше подходит ползать по земле. Так почему бы и не вернуться туда?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você está certa, é mais adequado aos {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} rastejarem no chão.{n}Então por que você não volta para lá?"

Umineko Project (UP): A slightly displeased expression rose to the witch's face when she realized that her own joy was not being shared. And she decided to listen to her former sister's request.
Steam (ST): A slightly displeased expression rose to the witch's face when she realized that her own joy was not being shared. Then, she decided to listen to her former sister's request.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A slightly displeased expression rose to the witch's face when she realized that her own joy was not being shared. Then, she decided to listen to her former sister's request.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分と同じ喜びを共有してくれないことに、魔女は少しだけ不愉快の表情を浮かべる。そして、元妹の願いを聞いてやることにした。
Russian (RU): Лёгкое недовольство отразилось на лице ведьмы, когда она поняла, что её радость нисколько не разделяют. И тогда она решила прислушаться к просьбе своей бывшей младшей сестры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma expressão de incômodo subiu ao rosto da bruxa quando ela percebeu que sua alegria não estava sendo compartilhada. E decidiu escutar o pedido de sua antiga irmã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女為她沒能感受到與自己相同的喜悅，而浮現出了略顯不愉快的表情。然後，實現了她原先的妹妹的請求。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女为她没能感受到与自己相同的喜悦，而浮现出了略显不愉快的表情。然后，实现了她原先的妹妹的请求。

Umineko Project (UP): In other words, Rosa was once again bound by the restrictions of gravity, as a {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}.
Steam (ST): In other words, Rosa was once again bound by the restrictions of gravity, as a Human.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In other words, Rosa was once again bound by the restrictions of gravity, as a human.

Russian (RU): Другим словами, Роза, будучи обычным {y:0:Челове}{n:0:челове}ком, вновь оказалась во власти силы земного притяжения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, Rosa estava mais uma vez vinculada aos grilhões da gravidade, como uma {y:0:Humana}{n:0:humana}.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 换句话说，这就是指楼座重归了人类的重力制约。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Following the laws that were originally correct, Rosa began to descend towards the ground upside‐down. No, she began to fall.
Steam (ST): ...Following the laws that were originally correct, Rosa began to descend towards the ground upside-down. No, she began to fall.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Following the laws that were originally correct, Rosa began to descend towards the ground upside-down. No, she began to fall.
PC Japanese (JP): ……本来の正しい法則に従い、楼座は真っ逆さまに大地へ降りていく。いや、落ちていく。
Russian (RU): ......Попав под действие изначального закона, Роза вверх тормашками начала спускаться на землю. Нет, она стала падать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Seguindo as leis naturais originalmente corretas, Rosa começou a descer em direção ao chão, de cabeça para baixo. Não, ela começou a cair.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……依循原先的正確法則，樓座頭朝下地往下降落。不，是摔向大地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……依循原先的正确法则，楼座头朝下地往下降落。不，是摔向大地。

Umineko Project (UP): "Oops... That's right, if I don't take her down the right way, this is what happens!"
Steam (ST): "Oops... That's right, if I don't take her down the right way, this is what happens!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「糟糕…。对了，不好好地放她下去，就会变成这样呢！」

Umineko Project (UP): The witch hadn't intended to send Rosa plummeting.{n}But she still wasn't used to using magic.
Steam (ST): The witch hadn't intended to send Rosa plummeting. But she still wasn't used to using magic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch hadn't intended to send Rosa plummeting. But she still wasn't used to using magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女は楼座を墜落させるつもりなどなかった。しかし、まだ魔法の使い方に慣れていなかったのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 魔女は楼座を墜落させるつもりなどなかった。{n}しかし、まだ魔法の使い方に慣れていなかったのだ。
Russian (RU): В намерения ведьмы не входило отправлять Розу в резкое падение.{n}Но она ещё не до конца привыкла к использованию магии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bruxa não pretendia mandar Rosa para baixo em queda livre.{n}Mas ela ainda não estava acostumada a usar magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女並非是想讓樓座摔下去。{n}這只是還沒用慣魔法的無心之舉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女并非是想让楼座摔下去。{n}这只是还没用惯魔法的无心之举。

Umineko Project (UP): After plummeting about 100 meters into a rose bush, as a very, very natural result, Rosa died instantly.
Steam (ST): After plummeting about 100 meters into a rose bush, as a very, very natural result, Rosa died instantly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After plummeting about 100 meters into a rose bush, as a very, very natural result, Rosa died instantly.
PC Japanese (JP): 薔薇の茂みに１００ｍ近くから墜落した楼座は、とてもとても当然の結果として、即座に絶命した。
Russian (RU): После падения примерно со 100 метров прямо на куст роз, Роза, итог чего был очевиден, тут же скончалась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de mergulhar cerca de 100 metros dentro de uma roseira, Rosa morreu instantaneamente, um resultado bastante previsível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從玫瑰叢上方將近一百米處墜落的樓座，作為極其理所當然的結果，當場喪命了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从玫瑰丛上方将近一百米处坠落的楼座，作为极其理所当然的结果，当场丧命了。

Umineko Project (UP): But the witch hadn't intended to kill her.{n}So she willed for Rosa not to die.
Steam (ST): But the witch hadn't intended to kill her. So she wished that Rosa hadn't died.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But the witch hadn't intended to kill her. So she wished that Rosa didn't die.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし魔女に殺すつもりはなかった。だから死ぬなと念じた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし魔女に殺すつもりはなかった。{n}だから死ぬなと念じた。
Russian (RU): Но ведьма совсем не собиралась убивать её.{n}Поскольку она и не думала убивать Розу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas a bruxa não pretendia matá‐la.{n}Por isso ela desejou que Rosa não morresse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，魔女並沒有打算殺她。{n}所以，心中默念了句，不准死。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，魔女并没有打算杀她。{n}所以，心中默念了句，不准死。

Umineko Project (UP): When she did, gold butterflies coiled about Rosa's body, reviving that life just as the witch had wished.
Steam (ST): When she did, gold butterflies coiled about Rosa's body, reviving that life just as the witch had wished.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she did, gold butterflies coiled about Rosa's body, reviving that life just as the witch had wished.
PC Japanese (JP): すると楼座の体に黄金蝶たちが纏わり付いて、その命を望んだ通りに蘇らせる。
Russian (RU): По её воле, золотые бабочки накрыли тело Розы, возвращая её к жизни, как того пожелала ведьма.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando ela assim o fez, borboletas douradas envolveram o corpo de Rosa, revivendo aquela vida exatamente conforme o desejo da bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，黃金蝶們纏繞上樓座的身體，照魔女所願，復甦了她的生命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，黄金蝶们缠绕上楼座的身体，照魔女所愿，复苏了她的生命。

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa's body, which had laid out a radial carpet of fresh blood, rapidly returned to normal.
Steam (ST): Rosa's body, which should have been spread out like a carpet of fresh blood, rapidly returned to normal.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa's body, which should have been spread out like a carpet of fresh blood, rapidly returned to normal.
PC Japanese (JP): 放射状に鮮血の絨毯を敷いたはずの楼座の体が、みるみる元に戻っていく。
Russian (RU): Тело Розы, которому полагалось быть размазанным ковром из свежей крови, мигом вернулось в обычное состояние.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O corpo de Rosa, que tinha formado um tapete radial de sangue fresco, voltou rapidamente ao normal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鋪開放射狀鮮血絨毯的樓座的身體，逐漸變回原狀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 铺开放射状鲜血绒毯的楼座的身体，逐渐变回原状。

Umineko Project (UP): The broken and crushed bones returned to normal.
Steam (ST): The broken and crushed bones returned to normal.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The broken and crushed bones returned to normal.
PC Japanese (JP): 折れたりひしゃげたりした骨が元に戻っていく。
Russian (RU): Сломанные и раздавленные кости стали прежними.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os ossos quebrados e esmagados retornaram ao normal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 斷裂、擠扁了的骨頭，開始變回原狀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 断裂、挤扁了的骨头，开始变回原状。

Umineko Project (UP): The torn and smashed flesh returned to normal.
Steam (ST): The torn and smashed flesh returned to normal.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The torn and smashed flesh returned to normal.
PC Japanese (JP): 裂けたり潰れたりした肉が元に戻っていく。
Russian (RU): Разорванная и расплющенная плоть стала прежней.

Brinque comigo mais um pouco, tá? *risos*risos*, ehehehaaha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}hahaha!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「還有，我真的不知道，人類是會這麼容易地死掉的哦。不過，已經讓你復活了，就沒問題了。所以，起來吧？再來和我繼續玩吧？嘻嘻嘻嘻，嗯哼哼啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「还有，我真的不知道，人类是会这么容易地死掉的哦。不过，已经让你复活了，就没问题了。所以，起来吧？再来和我继续玩吧？嘻嘻嘻嘻，嗯哼哼啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！」

Umineko Project (UP): What were those dreams you told me about when you were a kid...? Go ahead and tell me about all of them without holding back.
Steam (ST): What were those dreams you told me about when you were a kid...? Go ahead and tell me all of them without holding back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): あなたは子どもの頃、どんな夢を私に語ってくれたっけ…？　遠慮せずにその全てを教えて御覧なさい。
Russian (RU): О каких детских мечтах ты рассказывала мне, когда была ребёнком?.. Давай же, расскажи мне их все, не стесняйся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quais foram os sonhos que você me contou quando era criança...? Vá em frente e me conte sobre todos eles sem se segurar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 你兒時都與我談過怎樣的夢想呀…？別客氣，全都說來聽聽哦？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 你儿时都与我谈过怎样的梦想呀…？别客气，全都说来听听哦？

Umineko Project (UP): As I am now, I can make anything come true, no matter how absurd...!
Steam (ST): As I am now, I can make anything come true, no matter how absurd...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As I am now, I can make anything come true, no matter how absurd...!
PC Japanese (JP): 今の私には、それがどんなに荒唐無稽なことであっても叶えてあげられる…！
Russian (RU): Поскольку прямо сейчас я могу исполнить их, насколько бы нелепы они ни были!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como estou agora, posso fazer qualquer coisa se tornar realidade, não importa o quão seja absurda...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對現在的我來說，無論是多麼荒唐無稽的夢想，都能將之實現…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对现在的我来说，无论是多么荒唐无稽的梦想，都能将之实现…！

Umineko Project (UP): I can let you drown in a ocean of jelly!{n}I can swallow you up in a mountain of cake!{n}I can even make you grow butterfly wings and let you fly around the garden!
Steam (ST): Even drowning you in a sea of jelly! Even having you get sucked into a mountain of cake! I can even even make you sprout butterfly wings and flit around the garden, okay?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even making you fall into a sea of jelly! Even having you get sucked into a mountain of cake! I can even even make you sprout butterfly wings and let you walk around the garden, okay?!
PC Japanese (JP): あなたをゼリーの海で溺れさせてあげることも！　ケーキの山で飲み込んであげることも！　蝶の羽を生やしてお庭を散歩させてあげることさえね？！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): あなたをゼリーの海で溺れさせてあげることも！{n}ケーキの山で飲み込んであげることも！{n}蝶の羽を生やしてお庭を散歩させてあげることさえね？！
Russian (RU): Я даже могу утопить тебя в море желе!{n}Могу засыпать тебя горой из пирожных!{n}Я даже могу заставить тебя отрастить крылья бабочки и дать погулять по розарию, как тебе?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu posso deixar você se afogar em um oceano de gelatina!{n}Eu posso fazer você ser sugada para dentro de uma montanha de bolo!{n}Eu posso até fazer asas de borboleta crescerem em você e deixá‐la voar pelo jardim!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能令你被果凍的海洋淹沒！{n}能令你被蛋糕堆起來的山吞噬！{n}甚至連令你長出蝴蝶翅膀，飛往庭園散步，都做得到哦？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能令你被果冻的海洋淹没！{n}能令你被蛋糕堆起来的山吞噬！{n}甚至连令你长出蝴蝶翅膀，飞往庭园散步，都做得到哦？！

Umineko Project (UP): I'll do them one after another, let's start with the ocean of jelly, okay...?!
Steam (ST): I'll do them one after another. Let's start with the ocean of jelly, all right...?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'll do them one after another. Let's start with the ocean of jelly, okay...?!
PC Japanese (JP): 順番に叶えてあげるわ、まずはゼリーの海からね…？！
Russian (RU): Я исполню их одно за другим. Начнём с моря желе, хорошо?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu vou fazer uma coisa depois da outra, vamos começar com o oceano de gelatina, certo...?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就依順序來實現你的願望吧，首先是從果凍的海洋開始哦…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就依顺序来实现你的愿望吧，首先是从果冻的海洋开始哦…？！

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "S-Stop it, ......urgg!!"
Russian (RU): "П‐Прекрати... ургг!!!"
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa was once again thrown high into the rainy sky. However, the sky wasn't filled with raindrops, but with drops of orange juice.
Steam (ST): Rosa was once again thrown high into the rainy sky. However, the sky wasn't filled with raindrops, but with drops of orange juice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は再び雨天の空へ高く放り上げられる。しかし雨天の空は雨粒ではなく、オレンジジュースの雫で満たされていた。
Russian (RU): Роза снова оказалась подброшена высоко в дождливое небо. Однако небо оказалось наполнено отнюдь не каплями дождя, а каплями апельсинового сока.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa foi mais uma vez jogada contra o céu chuvoso. No entanto, o céu não estava mais cheio de gotas de chuva, mas de gotas de suco de laranja.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座再次被高高拋上了下著雨的天空。不過，布滿了天空的並非雨水，而是一滴滴的桔子汁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座再次被高高抛上了下着雨的天空。不过，布满了天空的并非雨水，而是一滴滴的桔子汁。

Umineko Project (UP): When she looked down, Rosa had to doubt her eyes. The rose garden had disappeared, and the ground spread out beneath her was like a pastel‐colored jigsaw puzzle.
Steam (ST): When she looked down, Rosa had to doubt her eyes. The rose garden had disappeared, and the ground spread out beneath her was like a pastel-colored jigsaw puzzle.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she looked down, Rosa had to doubt her eyes. The rose garden had disappeared, and the ground spread out beneath her was like a pastel-colored jigsaw puzzle.
PC Japanese (JP): 眼下を見て、楼座は目を疑う。薔薇庭園は消え去り、パステルカラーのジグソーパズルのような大地が広がっていた。
Russian (RU): Когда она посмотрела вниз, Роза не поверила своим глазам. Розария больше не было, а земля под ней раскинулась мозаикой пастельных оттенков.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando olhou para baixo, Rosa duvidou de seus olhos. O jardim de rosas tinha sumido e o chão se estendia abaixo dela como um quebra‐cabeça de cor pastel.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朝身下望去，樓座不禁懷疑起了自己的眼睛。玫瑰庭園無影無踪，在下方展開的是柔和色調的，如拼圖般的大地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朝身下望去，楼座不禁怀疑起了自己的眼睛。玫瑰庭园无影无踪，在下方展开的是柔和色调的，如拼图般的大地。

Umineko Project (UP): ......It was from the dream she had talked about when she was young, an ocean of jelly.
Steam (ST): ...It was an ocean of jelly, like the one she had spoken of from her dreams when she was young.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……それは彼女が小さな頃に夢見て話した、ゼリーの海。
Russian (RU): ......Именно во сне, как она говорила, когда мала юной, она видела океан желе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era do sonho que ela tinha contado quando era jovem, um oceano de gelatina.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是她小時候夢想出來的，與姐姐講過的，果凍的海洋。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这是她小时候梦想出来的，与姐姐讲过的，果冻的海洋。

Umineko Project (UP): The black part was coffee jelly. The red was strawberry, the yellow was pineapple, the green was melon.
Steam (ST): The black part was coffee jelly. The red was strawberry, the yellow was pineapple, and the green was melon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The black part was coffee jelly. The red was strawberry, the yellow was pineapple, the green was melon.
PC Japanese (JP): 黒はコーヒーゼリー。赤はイチゴ、黄色はパイン、緑はメロン。
Russian (RU): Чёрная часть была кофейным желе. Красная — клубничным, жёлтая — ананасовым, зелёная — дынным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A parte preta era gelatina de café. A vermelha era de morango, a amarela era de abacaxi, a verde era de melão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑色的是咖啡果凍。紅色的是草莓、黃色的是菠蘿、綠色的是甜瓜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑色的是咖啡果冻。红色的是草莓、黄色的是菠萝、绿色的是甜瓜。

Umineko Project (UP): What was the white part, apple, perhaps...?
Steam (ST): What was the white part, apple...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What was the white part, apple...?
PC Japanese (JP): 白は何だろう、リンゴかしら…？
Russian (RU): Каким была белая часть? Яблочным?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que era a parte branca, maçã, talvez...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 白色的是什麼呢，是蘋果嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 白色的是什么呢，是苹果吗…？

Umineko Project (UP): .........Did Rosa even have the time to think something like that?
Steam (ST): ......Did Rosa even have the time to think stuff like that?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........Did Rosa even have the time to think something like that?
PC Japanese (JP): ………そんなこと、楼座に思考する余地があったのかどうか。
Russian (RU): .........Неужели у Розы ещё было время, чтобы думать о подобных вещах?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Rosa até tinha tempo para pensar em algo assim?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………不知樓座是否有功夫思考這些。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………不知楼座是否有功夫思考这些。

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa fell towards that multi‐colored ocean.
Steam (ST): Rosa fell towards that multi-colored ocean...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa fell towards that multi-colored ocean.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座はその色とりどりの海に目掛けて墜落していく。
Russian (RU): Роза упала прямо в этот многоцветный океан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa caiu em direção àquele oceano multicolorido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她朝著這五彩繽紛的大海，直直地墜落了下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她朝着这五彩缤纷的大海，直直地坠落了下去。

Umineko Project (UP): ......And sank deep into a grape‐flavored purple sea.
Steam (ST): ...And she sunk deep into a purple grape-flavored sea.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And sunk deep into the purple grape-flavored ocean.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そして紫色のグレープ味の海に深々と沈んだ。
Russian (RU): ......И глубоко утонула в океане и вкусе фиолетового винограда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......E afundou profundamente em um mar púrpura, sabor uva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然後，她深深沉入了紫色的葡萄味的海洋。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然后，她深深沉入了紫色的葡萄味的海洋。

Umineko Project (UP): It really was an ocean of jelly. It had no bottom.
Steam (ST): It really was an ocean of jelly. It had no bottom.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It really was an ocean of jelly. It had no bottom.
PC Japanese (JP): それは本当にゼリーの海。底などない。
Russian (RU): Это действительно был океан желе. У него не было дна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era realmente um oceano de gelatina. Não tinha fundo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是真真正正的果凍海。不存在海底。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是真真正正的果冻海。不存在海底。

Umineko Project (UP): As Rosa sank, she was shocked to see a school of transparent fish swimming through the grape jelly ocean.
Steam (ST): As Rosa sank, she was shocked to see a school of transparent fish swimming through the grape jelly ocean.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Rosa sank, she was shocked to see a school of transparent fish swimming through the grape jelly ocean.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は沈みながら、グレープゼリーの海の中を泳ぐ透明な魚の群を呆然と見ていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 楼座は沈みながら、グレープゼリーの海の中を泳ぐ透明な魚の群れを呆然と見ていた。
Russian (RU): Когда Роза тонула, она была потрясена, увидев стаи прозрачных рыб, плывущих в океане виноградного желе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): À medida que Rosa afundava, ela ficou chocada ao ver um cardume de peixes transparentes nadando através do oceano de gelatina de uva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座邊往下沉，邊呆然地看著游在葡萄果凍海洋中的透明魚群。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座边往下沉，边呆然地看着游在葡萄果冻海洋中的透明鱼群。

Umineko Project (UP): They were probably made of grape skin.
Steam (ST): They were probably made of grape skin.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They were probably made of grape skin.
PC Japanese (JP): それは多分、葡萄の果肉で出来ているに違いない。
Russian (RU): Вполне вероятно, они были созданы из виноградной кожуры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles provavelmente eram feitos de casca da uva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這些魚多半是以葡萄果肉做出來的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些鱼多半是以葡萄果肉做出来的。

Umineko Project (UP): Then she sank on and on, deeper and deeper, as deep as the Mariana Trench, ......compressed tight by the water pressure of the jelly ocean, as her ribs crushed and crunched, as her spine snapped and cracked.
Steam (ST): Then she sunk on and on, deeper and deeper, as deep as the Marianas Trench, ...crushed by the water pressure of the jelly ocean... as her ribs snapped, as her spine snapped.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then she sunk on and on, deeper and deeper, as deep as the Marianas Trench, ......crushed by the water pressure of the jelly ocean, as her ribs snapped, as her spine snapped.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてどこまでもどこまでも深く深く沈んで行き、マリアナ海溝くらい沈んで行き、……ゼリーの海の水圧でぎゅうぎゅうに押し潰されて、肋骨がぱきぽき、背骨がばきぼき。
Russian (RU): А она тонула дальше, глубже и глубже, словно в глубину впадины Марианских островов... Пока давлением воды океана желе не раздавило её, смяв ребра и переломав позвоночник.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela afundou cada vez mais profundamente, em um mar tão profundo quanto a Fossa das Marianas, ......sendo comprimida fortemente pela pressão da água do oceano de gelatina. Suas costelas eram quebradas e esmagadas, sua espinha quebrada e dilacerada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，她往無窮無盡的深處沉啊，沉啊，沉啊，沉到馬里亞納海溝般的深度，……被果凍海的水壓全方位地擠壓全身，肋骨噶吱噶吱，脊梁骨啪嚓啪嚓。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，她往无穷无尽的深处沉啊，沉啊，沉啊，沉到马里亚纳海沟般的深度，……被果冻海的水压全方位地挤压全身，肋骨噶吱噶吱，脊梁骨啪嚓啪嚓。

Umineko Project (UP): ...In the end, she had become a small, frail meatball.
Steam (ST): ...In the end, she became a small, frail meatball.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …最後は小ちゃなぐずぐずの肉団子になってしまった。
Russian (RU): ...В самом конце, она стала напоминать тягучий, мясистый шарик.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Pro fim, ela se transformou em uma pequena e frágil almôndega.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …最後成為了一粒小小的鬆垮垮的肉團子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …最后成为了一粒小小的松垮垮的肉团子。

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "Ahhahahahahahahahaha! What a truly wonderful experience, to drown to death in an ocean of jelly...!! It's a dream no one else can imitate!! I granted it for you, ahhyahyahyahya!!"
Steam (ST): "Ahhahahahahahahahaha! What a truly wonderful experience, to drown in an ocean of jelly...!! It's a dream no one else can imitate!! I made it come true for you, ahhyahyahyahya!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ahhahahahahahahahaha! What a truly wonderful experience, to drown to death in an ocean of jelly...!! It's a dream no one else can imitate!! I have made it come true for you, ahhyahyahyahya!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あっはははははははははッ！ゼリーの海で溺れ死ねるなんて、本当に素敵な体験よね…！！　誰にも真似できない夢！　私が叶えてあげたッ、あっひゃひゃひゃひゃ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あっはははははははははッ！　ゼリーの海で溺れ死ねるなんて、本当に素敵な体験よね…！！　誰にも真似できない夢！　私が叶えてあげたッ、あっひゃひゃひゃひゃ！！」
Russian (RU): "Ахха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха! Что, действительно превосходный опыт, быть до смерти утопленной в океане желе!!!... Эта мечта просто неподражаема!!! Я осуществила её для тебя, ахха‐ха‐ха‐ха!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ahhahahahahahahahaha! Que experiência verdadeiramente maravilhosa, se afogar até a morte em um oceano de gelatina...!! É um sonho que ninguém mais pode imitar!! Eu o concedi a você, ahhyahyahyahya!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！在果凍海裡溺死，可真是美妙的體驗呢…！！誰也模仿不了的夢想！我幫你實現了哦，啊哈哈哈哈！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！在果冻海里溺死，可真是美妙的体验呢…！！谁也模仿不了的梦想！我帮你实现了哦，啊哈哈哈哈！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The instant I snapped my fingers, the meatball that had been Rosa was launched up into the sky.
Steam (ST): The instant I snapped my fingers, the meatball that had been Rosa was launched up into the sky.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座だった肉団子は、私が指を鳴らすと瞬時に大空へ打ち上げられる。
Russian (RU): Стоило мне только щёлкнуть пальцами — и мясной шарик из Розы вылетел в небо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No instante em que estalei meus dedos, a almôndega que tinha sido Rosa foi lançada para o céu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 曾叫做樓座的肉團子，隨著我一個響指，頓時飛到了半空中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 曾叫做楼座的肉团子，随着我一个响指，顿时飞到了半空中。

Umineko Project (UP): And after being enveloped in a golden brilliance, she returned to her original form.
Steam (ST): And after being wrapped up in a golden sparkle, she returned to her original form.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And after being wrapped up in a golden sparkle, she returned to her original form.
PC Japanese (JP): そして黄金色の輝きに包まれた後は、再び元の姿に戻っていた。
Russian (RU): И после этого, окутанная золотым сиянием, она вернулась в свою изначальную форму.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E depois de ser envolvida em um brilho dourado, retornou à sua forma original.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，在金色的光芒包圍住它之後，再度變回了原先的樣子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，在金色的光芒包围住它之后，再度变回了原先的样子。

Umineko Project (UP): It was as simple and easy as returning dried seaweed to its original form, and anyone could do it. If they were a witch!
Steam (ST): It was as simple and easy as returning dried seaweed to its original form, and anyone could do it. If they were a witch!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was as simple and easy as returning dried seaweed to its original form, and anyone could do it. If they were a witch!
PC Japanese (JP): 乾燥ワカメを元の姿に戻すのと同じくらいに簡単お手軽、誰でもできる。魔女になら！
Russian (RU): Это казалось так легко и просто, подобно возвращению сушеных водорослей в их изначальную форму, и каждый мог это сделать. Если это была ведьма!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era tão simples e fácil quanto devolver as algas secas à sua forma original, e qualquer um poderia fazer isso. Desde que fosse uma bruxa!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如同把脫水裙帶菜復原般簡單輕鬆，誰都做得到。只要是個魔女！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如同把脱水裙带菜复原般简单轻松，谁都做得到。只要是个魔女！

Umineko Project (UP): That vacant look on Rosa's face...had to be because of the joy from having that dream she had given up on as a child made into reality. Definitely. Probably.
Steam (ST): That absent-minded look on Rosa's face has to be the joy from having that dream she gave up on as a child come true. Definitely. Probably.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That absent-minded look on Rosa's face has to be because of the joy from having that dream she had given up on as a child made into reality. Definitely. Probably.
PC Japanese (JP): 放心する楼座のその表情は多分、子どもの頃に見た、叶わぬと諦めていた夢が現実となったことへの喜びによるものに違いない。きっと。多分。
Russian (RU): Это рассеянное выражение на лице Розы, возможно, и было выражением той радости от того, что её детская мечта смогла воплотиться наяву. Определённо. Наверняка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele olhar vazio no rosto da Rosa...tinha de ser por causa da alegria de ver esse sonho de criança, do qual ela tinha desistido, transformado em realidade. Definitivamente. Provavelmente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 茫然自失的樓座的表情，一定是出於，對早已死心的兒時夢想化為了現實的喜悅。一定如此。大概吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 茫然自失的楼座的表情，一定是出于，对早已死心的儿时梦想化为了现实的喜悦。一定如此。大概吧。

Umineko Project (UP): Next is the mountain of cake.{n}In an instant, the sky was covered, and became patterned black and white like a chessboard.
Steam (ST): Next is the mountain of cake. In an instant, the sky was covered...and became black and white in the shape of a chessboard.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Next is the mountain of cake. In an instant, the sky was covered, and became black and white in the shape of a chessboard.
PC Japanese (JP): 次はケーキの山。空が瞬時に覆われ、白と黒のチェス模様になった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 次はケーキの山。{n}空が瞬時に覆われ、白と黒のチェス模様になった。
Russian (RU): Дальше идёт гора из пирожных.{n}В один миг, небо оказалось закрыто и покрылось чёрно‐белым шахматным узором.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A próxima coisa é a montanha de bolo.{n}Em um instante, o céu ficou coberto, padronizado em preto e branco, como um tabuleiro de xadrez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 下一個是蛋糕山。{n}天空頓時化為了白黑相間，猶如國際象棋盤的圖案。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 下一个是蛋糕山。{n}天空顿时化为了白黑相间，犹如国际象棋盘的图案。

Umineko Project (UP): That almost transparent white part was her favorite gelatin cheesecake.{n}The elegant black part was a slightly bitter gâteau au chocolat.
Steam (ST): That almost transparent white part was her favorite rare cheesecake. The elegant black part was a slightly bitter Gateau au chocolat.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That almost transparent white part was her favorite rare cheesecake. The elegant black part was a slightly bitter Gateau au chocolat.
PC Japanese (JP): 透き通るような白は、大好きなレアチーズケーキ。上品な黒は、ほんのりビターなガトーショコラ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 透き通るような白は、大好きなレアチーズケーキ。{n}上品な黒は、ほんのりビターなガトーショコラ。
Russian (RU): Почти прозрачной белой частью была её любимая редкая сладкая ватрушка.{n}Чёрной частью были пирожные из слегка горького шоколада.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa parte branca quase transparente era o seu {i:cheesecake} de gelatina favorito.{n}A elegante parte preta era um {i:gâteau au chocolat} um pouco amargo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那白到通體透徹的，是她最喜歡的奶酪蛋奶凍。{n}那高貴的黑色，是略帶苦味的巧克力蛋糕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那白到通体透彻的，是她最喜欢的奶酪蛋奶冻。{n}那高贵的黑色，是略带苦味的巧克力蛋糕。

Umineko Project (UP): They were a ceiling, they were a mountain, ......and those several billion cakes were thrown down towards Rosa.
Steam (ST): That became the ceiling, became a mountain, ...and several billion cakes were thrown down towards Rosa.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That became the ceiling, became a mountain, ......several billion cakes were thrown down towards Rosa.
PC Japanese (JP): それが天井となって、山となって、……数億個のケーキが楼座目掛けて振り落ちてくる。
Russian (RU): Заполонив всё небо, превратившись в целую гору... Несколько миллиардов пирожных были сброшены вниз на Розу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles eram um teto, eles se tornaram uma montanha, ......e aqueles vários bilhões de bolos foram lançados em direção a Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它們化為了天花板，化為了山，……數億個蛋糕瞄準了樓座，向她砸去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它们化为了天花板，化为了山，……数亿个蛋糕瞄准了楼座，向她砸去。

Umineko Project (UP): If you piled those cakes up, they would surely be taller than Everest.
Steam (ST): If you piled those cakes up, they would surely be taller than Mount Everest.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If you piled those cakes up, they would surely be taller than Mount Everest.
PC Japanese (JP): そのケーキの山はきっと、積み上げればエベレストより高い。
Russian (RU): Если свалить все эти пирожные вместе, то вполне вероятно, они поднялись бы ещё выше горы Эверест.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se você empilhasse esses bolos, eles certamente seriam mais altos que o Everest.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這座蛋糕山，如果堆起來的話，一定會比珠穆朗瑪峰還要高。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这座蛋糕山，如果堆起来的话，一定会比珠穆朗玛峰还要高。

Umineko Project (UP): So they probably weighed.........I'm not too sure, but it was probably heavier than all the cakes across Japan put together.
Steam (ST): So they probably weighed... ...I'm not too sure, but I'll bet it was heavier than all the cakes across Japan put together.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So they probably weighed, .........I'm not too sure, but it was probably heavier than all the cakes across Japan put together.
PC Japanese (JP): だから重さは多分、………よくわからないけど、日本中のケーキを全部合わせたよりは重いと思う。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, если примерно измерить их вес... Я затрудняюсь сказать точно, но вполне очевидно, что этот вес гораздо тяжелее всех вместе взятых тортов Японии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se você os pesasse então.........eu não tenho muita certeza, mas provavelmente seria mais pesado do que todos os bolos do Japão juntos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以這重量大概有，………不太清楚，應該比全日本的蛋糕全加起來都要重吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以这重量大概有，………不太清楚，应该比全日本的蛋糕全加起来都要重吧。

Umineko Project (UP): It fell down like a ceiling and swallowed Rosa up, ......so as a very, very natural result, Rosa was crushed to death.
Steam (ST): It fell down like a ceiling and swallowed Rosa up, ...so as a very, very natural result, Rosa was crushed to death.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It fell down like a ceiling and swallowed Rosa up, ......so as a very, very natural result, Rosa was crushed to death.
PC Japanese (JP): それが落ち来る天井として楼座を飲み込んだのだから、……とてもとても当然の結果として、楼座は圧死した。
Russian (RU): Они накрыли Розу, потоком обрушившись вниз, поэтому очень и очень очевидным итогом стало то, что Роза оказалась до смерти раздавлена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Caiu como um teto e engoliu Rosa, ......logo, como um resultado muito, muito natural, Rosa foi esmagada até a morte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為這塊落下的天花板吞噬了樓座，……所以，作為極其理所當然的結果，樓座被壓死了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为这块落下的天花板吞噬了楼座，……所以，作为极其理所当然的结果，楼座被压死了。

Umineko Project (UP): In less than a second, her bones broke throughout her body and her insides were all smashed and forced out, spladdasplutslop.
Steam (ST): In less than a second, her bones broke throughout her body and her insides were all smashed and forced out, *squish*pop*slop*.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In less than a second, her bones broke throughout her body and her insides were all smashed and forced out, *squish*pop*slop*.
PC Japanese (JP): １秒にも満たないわずかの時間で、全身の骨が砕けて内臓が全て潰れてはみ出して、ぷちゃぐちゃぶちゃあ。
Russian (RU): В течение менее чем секунды, все кости её тела были переломаны, а внутренности разорваны и выпущены, *хлюп*гульп*гульп*.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em menos de um segundo, seus ossos quebraram por todo o corpo e suas entranhas foram completamente esmagadas e forçadas para fora, puchaguchabuchaa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在一秒都不到的時間裡，全身骨頭盡碎，內臟全被壓得潰爛，擠出了身體，稀爛稀爛，不成人形。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在一秒都不到的时间里，全身骨头尽碎，内脏全被压得溃烂，挤出了身体，稀烂稀烂，不成人形。

Umineko Project (UP): And yet still an even greater number of cakes piled up on top, ...and Rosa ended up as a layer of jam wedged between the cakes.
Steam (ST): Even so, an even greater number of cakes piled up on top, ...and Rosa ended up as a layer of jam wedged between them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even so, an even greater number of cakes piled up on top, ...and Rosa ended up as a layer of jam wedged between the cakes.
PC Japanese (JP): それでもなおすごい数のケーキが積み上がるので、…楼座はケーキの間に挟まれたジャムの地層と成り果ててしまった。
Russian (RU): Несмотря на это, ещё больше пирожных было свалено на самую вершину, и Роза в итоге стала просто слоем джема размазанного между тортами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E mesmo assim havia um número ainda maior de bolos empilhados no topo, ...e Rosa terminou como uma camada de gelatina entre os bolos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，由於還有數不勝數的蛋糕在往上堆，…所以，樓座被壓進了蛋糕裡，變成了果醬地層。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，由于还有数不胜数的蛋糕在往上堆，…所以，楼座被压进了蛋糕里，变成了果酱地层。

Umineko Project (UP): She became as thin as a single hair, and was probably smashed out into the area of a tennis court.
Steam (ST): She became as thin as a single hair...and was probably spread out over the area of a tennis court.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She became as thick as a single hair, and was probably smashed out into the area of a tennis court.
PC Japanese (JP): 髪の毛程度の厚みになって、多分、テニスコートくらいの広さに潰れて広がっただろう。
Russian (RU): Она истончилась до толщины одного волоса, словно на неё обрушился раздавивший её теннисный корт.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela ficou tão densa quanto um único fio cabelo, e provavelmente foi esmagada dentro de uma área equivalente a uma quadra de tênis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 薄如頭髮的樓座，多半是被壓扁延伸到有一個網球場那麼大了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 薄如头发的楼座，多半是被压扁延伸到有一个网球场那么大了吧。

Umineko Project (UP): That world swallowed up by cake was once again absorbed by a golden flash.
Steam (ST): That world swallowed up by cake was once again absorbed by a gold flash.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That world swallowed up by cake was once again absorbed by a gold flash.
PC Japanese (JP): そのケーキに飲み込まれた世界が再び黄金色の輝きに飲み込まれる。
Russian (RU): Этот мир пирожных снова оказался озарён золотой вспышкой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele mundo engolido pelo bolo foi mais uma vez absorvido por um flash dourado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被蛋糕吞沒的世界，再次被金色光芒所吞沒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被蛋糕吞没的世界，再次被金色光芒所吞没。

Umineko Project (UP): Then, as though it had all been a dream, Rosa was revived once again.
Steam (ST): Then, as though it had all been a dream, Rosa was revived once again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, as though it had all been a dream, Rosa was revived once again.
PC Japanese (JP): するとそれが夢であったとでも言うように、楼座は再び蘇っていた。
Russian (RU): Тут же, словно всё это было лишь сном, Роза была снова возрождена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, como se tudo tivesse sido um sonho, Rosa foi ressuscitada mais uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，就如一場夢一般，樓座再次活了過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，就如一场梦一般，楼座再次活了过来。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Of course, it definitely wasn't a dream.{n}She had been revived after dying.
Steam (ST): ...Of course, it definitely wasn't a dream. She had been revived after dying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Of course, it definitely wasn't a dream. She had been revived after dying.
PC Japanese (JP): ……もちろん夢では断じてない。死んだ後、再び蘇ったのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……もちろん夢では断じてない。{n}死んだ後、再び蘇ったのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Разумеется, это определённо не было сном.{n}Она была возрождена после смерти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Naturalmente, isso definitivamente não era um sonho.{n}Ela tinha sido ressuscitada depois de morrer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……當然，這斷然不是夢。{n}是死後再復活的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……当然，这断然不是梦。{n}是死后再复活的。

Umineko Project (UP): By that point, death, which most {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s only have to experience once after they are born, had already been experienced repeatedly by Rosa.
Steam (ST): By that point, death, which most Humans only have to experience once after they are born, had already been experienced repeatedly by Rosa.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By that point, death, which most humans only have to experience once after they are born, had already been experienced repeatedly by Rosa.
PC Japanese (JP): この時点で楼座は、ニンゲンに生まれたなら一度だけしか味わわなくていい死の経験を、すでに二度も味わったわけだ。
Russian (RU): К этому моменту смерть, которую большинство {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ей могут испытать лишь раз после своего рождения, уже стала практическим опытом для Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até esse momento, a morte, que a maior parte dos {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} experienciam apenas uma vez depois que nascem, tinha sido experimentada inúmeras vezes por Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 至此，樓座已品嘗了兩次，每個出生到世上的人類，都只需品嘗一次的死亡體驗。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 至此，楼座已品尝了两次，每个出生到世上的人类，都只需品尝一次的死亡体验。

Umineko Project (UP): In other words, she had gone through that which {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s cannot, the precious experience of dying more than once.
Steam (ST): In other words, she gone through that which Humans cannot, the precious experience of dying more than once.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In other words, she gone through that which humans cannot, the precious experience of dying more than once.
PC Japanese (JP): つまり、ニンゲンには味わうこのとできない、二度の死という貴重な経験を味わったのだ。
Russian (RU): Другими словами, она прошла через то, что недоступно другим {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ям, бесценный опыт умирания более одного раза.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, ela tinha passado por uma experiência que {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} não conseguem ter, a preciosa experiência de morrer mais de uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這也就是說，她體驗到了人類無法體驗到的，名為“第二次的死”的貴重經歷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这也就是说，她体验到了人类无法体验到的，名为“第二次的死”的贵重经历。

Umineko Project (UP): Laughing innocently, she pointed her gold staff at Rosa as she begged for mercy.
Steam (ST): Laughing innocently, she pointed her gold staff at Rosa as she begged for mercy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 許しを懇願する楼座に、無邪気に笑いながらその黄金の杖を向ける。
Russian (RU): Невинно смеясь, она указала золотой тростью на Розу, молившую о пощаде.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rindo inocentemente, ela apontou seu cajado de ouro para Rosa, enquanto esta implorava por misericórdia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 面對懇求饒恕的樓座，她天真無邪地笑著，揮舞了黃金杖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 面对恳求饶恕的楼座，她天真无邪地笑着，挥舞了黄金杖。

Umineko Project (UP): When she did, Rosa glittered gold and rapidly began to shrink.
Steam (ST): When she did, Rosa glittered gold and rapidly began to shrink.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she did, Rosa glittered gold and rapidly began to shrink.
PC Japanese (JP): すると楼座は黄金色に輝きながら見る見る縮んでいく。
Russian (RU): После этого Роза сверкнула золотом и стала стремительно съеживаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao fazer tal coisa, Rosa brilhou como ouro e rapidamente começou a encolher.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，樓座就閃耀著金光，越縮越小了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，楼座就闪耀着金光，越缩越小了。

Umineko Project (UP): She shrank down to the size of a real butterfly. Then, gold wings sprouted from her back...and she joined her fellow gold butterflies.
Steam (ST): She shrank down to the size of a real butterfly. Then, gold wings sprouted from her back, ...and she joined her fellow gold butterflies.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She shrank down to the size of a real butterfly. Then, gold wings sprouted from her back..., and she joined her fellow gold butterflies.
PC Japanese (JP): 本当の蝶々くらいの大きさにまで縮んでいく。そして背中には黄金の羽が生え…、黄金蝶たちの仲間に加わった。
Russian (RU): Она уменьшилась до размеров настоящей бабочки. Затем, золотые крылья отросли на спине, и она присоединилась к своим соплеменницам золотым бабочкам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela encolheu até o tamanho de uma borboleta de verdade. Então, asas douradas brotaram de suas costas... e ela se juntou às outras borboletas douradas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 縮到了蝴蝶般大小後。樓座的後背上長出了黃金翅膀…，加入了黃金蝶們的行列。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 缩到了蝴蝶般大小后。楼座的后背上长出了黄金翅膀…，加入了黄金蝶们的行列。

Umineko Project (UP): However, while a human body could withstand this wind, it was a different matter for a butterfly's body.
Steam (ST): However, while a human body could withstand that wind, it was a different matter for a butterfly's body.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, while a human body could withstand that wind, it was a different matter for a butterfly's body.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、人の身には耐えられる風でも、蝶の身には辛いもの。
Russian (RU): Однако в то время, как человеческое тело в состоянии противостоять ветру, то бабочки — совсем другое дело.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, enquanto um corpo humano poderia suportar este vento, o mesmo não se aplicava ao corpo de uma borboleta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，以人類的身體能承受住的大風，對蝴蝶之身來說卻非常難熬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，以人类的身体能承受住的大风，对蝴蝶之身来说却非常难熬。

Umineko Project (UP): The gold butterfly Rosa was invited to dance by each gale of wind, and she spun in circles around the rose garden.
Steam (ST): The gold butterfly Rosa...was invited to dance by each gale of wind, and she spun in circles around the rose garden.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The gold butterfly Rosa was invited to dance by each gale of wind, and she spun in circles around the rose garden.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金蝶となった楼座は、暴風たちに次々とダンスを申し込まれては、薔薇庭園をくるくると舞い踊った。
Russian (RU): Золотая бабочка Роза была подхвачена в танце вихря и, танцуя, кружилась по всему розарию.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A borboleta dourada Rosa foi convidada a dançar com a ventania, e rodopiou em círculos pelo jardim de rosas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 成為了黃金蝶的樓座，受暴風們爭相邀舞，在玫瑰庭園中轉著圈，跳起了舞蹈。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 成为了黄金蝶的楼座，受暴风们争相邀舞，在玫瑰庭园中转着圈，跳起了舞蹈。

Russian (RU): Когда танец выбил её из сил, нежная постель подхватила её.
